title: Champion recomendations
body: I recently bought gnar and have been loving the random element incorporated in his kit. You dont always get to be mini/mega when it suits you, but on those rare occasions where the stars and the planets align make me love him. Are there any other champions with the same style of randomness in their kits like gnar? I guess its because he reminded me of chaos knight from dota.

replies.body:
how does he remind you of sven.

the way I used to build him there was no RNG at all
Choas Knight, not sven. The one with the illusion ult and random stun/pull/crit
Gangplank, Yasuo and Tryndamere come to mind, I hate crit champions anyways, enjoy.
